description:
In charge of the asteroid base Theart Star, Full Flat has been provided complete independence by Poseidal. Daba and the others first encounter her after leaving the planet Mizun. Later in the series she teams up with Giwaza to rebel against Poseidal, but has her own ulterior motives.

Full Flat was one of Poseidal(Amandara Kamandara)`s Temple Knights and vied for his love along with Mian. Full Flat was unable to win his love, but was given eternal youth by him. As the decades passed however, she grew bored with her life and resentful towards Poseidal for his treatment of her and Mian. During the final battle she heads down to Sveto and tries twice to break Mian from his grasps. The second such time she is killed when the L-Gaim Mark II accidentally falls on her.
name: Full Flat
